protein.general_function: Involved in extracellular matrix constituent, lubricant
protein.specific_function: Salivary protein that stabilizes saliva supersaturated with calcium salts by inhibiting the precipitation of calcium phosphate salts. It also modulates hydroxyapatite crystal formation on the tooth surface

reference.reference_text: Sabatini LM, Carlock LR, Johnson GW, Azen EA: cDNA cloning and chromosomal localization (4q11-13) of a gene for statherin, a regulator of calcium in saliva. Am J Hum Genet. 1987 Dec;41(6):1048-60.
